title: Happiest Minds Tech Q4 profit jumps 25%, revenues up 10%
description: Happiest Minds executive chairman Ashok Soota said the company is on track for its longterm vision of $1 billion revenue in FY31, thanks to its new generative AI business unit and two successful acquisitions.
content: Mid-sized IT solutions provider Happiest Minds Technologies posted a 24.8% year-on-year (YoY) rise in net profit at Rs 71.98 crore for the fourth quarter ending March 2024 from Rs 57.66 crore in the year-ago period.
